subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: The four-time Olympic champion Simon Ammann of Switzerland earned his first World Cup victory of the season at a large-hill event in Kuusamo, Finland, with the best jump in both rounds.
snippet: The four-time Olympic champion Simon Ammann of Switzerland earned his first World Cup victory of the season at a large-hill event in Kuusamo, Finland, with the best jump in both rounds.
